pr_title: Add functional tests and integration tests for Waiters

timeline.author: dagnir
dagnir

timeline.bodyText:
Seems like we need to test other scenarios as well such as

What happens when we reach max number of attempts
What happens when we get an unexpected exception
What happens to the client and scheduled executor when the the waiter is closed?
etc.

cc: @zoewangg for more suggestions
timeline.author: dagnir

replies.bodyText: The max number of attempts case is added in sync Waiters. Unexpected exception case has been covered by the tests for generic Waiters. For the third case, if the client and scheduled executor are configured while creating the Waiters then they won't be closed while the Waiters are closed, and tests related to this case are also added.
replies.author: Quanzzzz

replies.bodyText: @dagnir Good call! I added the test cases with unexpected exception and caught a bug in waiterRuntime 😅
replies.author: zoewangg

replies.bodyText: 😅Guess that's my fault. I misunderstood the unmatched exception case in the BaseWaiterTest, thanks for making sure about it again.
replies.author: Quanzzzz
